New Records: Golden State Warriors improved to 10-2 on the season, matching a new team record
Key Match Events: NBA upgraded Draymond Green's foul on Zach Edey to a Flagrant 1 after review
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies coach Taylor Jenkins criticized the officiating, questioning the lack of review for Draymond Green's foul
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game marked the latest chapter in the ongoing rivalry between the Golden State Warriors and Memphis Grizzlies, which has often been marked by controversial moments
